mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.name AS "name", a.parent_id AS "parentId", a.department_type AS "departmentType"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO check_department( id, create_date, update_date, del_flag, name, parent_id, department_type ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{name}, #{parentId}, #{departmentType} )
mapper.select: SELECT p.id parentId, p.name parentName, a.id sonId, a.name sonName FROM check_department a LEFT JOIN check_department p ON a.parent_id = p.id WHERE a.department_type = 2 and a.del_flag = 0 UNION ALL SELECT a.id parentId, a.name parentName, '' AS sonId, '' AS sonName FROM check_department a WHERE a.department_type = 1 and a.del_flag = 0 AND a.id NOT IN ( SELECT t.parent_id FROM check_department t WHERE t.department_type = 2 and t.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY t.parent_id )
SELECT count(a.id) FROM check_department a WHERE a.del_flag = '0' and a.name =#{name}
SELECT a.id parentId, a.name parentName FROM check_department a WHERE a.del_flag = 0 and a.department_type = '1'
SELECT name parentName FROM check_department WHERE del_flag = 0 and department_type = #{str}
SELECT id, NAME FROM check_department WHERE del_flag = '0' AND parent_id = #{id} ORDER BY NAME
select id from check_department where del_flag = '0' and name = #{name} limit 1
